statements.update: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [FileStorage] WHERE [Id]=#Id#) UPDATE [FileStorage] SET [FileName]=#FileName#, [ContentType]=#ContentType#, [FileSize]=#FileSize#, [Description]=#Description#, [SaveAsPath]=#SaveAsPath#, [UploadUserId]=#UploadUserId#, [UploadDateTime]=GETDATE() WHERE [Id]=#Id# ELSE INSERT INTO [FileStorage] ( [FileName], [ContentType], [FileSize], [Description], [SaveAsPath], [UploadUserId], [UploadDateTime] ) VALUES ( #FileName#, #ContentType#, #FileSize#, #Description#, #SaveAsPath#, #UploadUserId#, GETDATE() )
statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 [Id] AS Id, [FileName] AS FileName, [ContentType] AS ContentType, [FileSize] AS FileSize, [Description] AS Description, [SaveAsPath] AS SaveAsPath, [UploadUserId] AS UploadUserId, [UploadDateTime] AS UploadDateTime FROM [FileStorage] WHERE [Id]=#value#

SELECT TOP 1 [Id] AS Id, [FileName] AS FileName, [ContentType] AS ContentType, [FileSize] AS FileSize, [Description] AS Description, [SaveAsPath] AS SaveAsPath, [UploadUserId] AS UploadUserId, [UploadDateTime] AS UploadDateTime FROM [FileStorage] WHERE [SaveAsPath]=#value#

WITH CTE AS( SELECT a.[Id] AS Id, [FileName] AS FileName, [ContentType] AS ContentType, [FileSize] AS FileSize, [Description] AS Description, [SaveAsPath] AS SaveAsPath, [UploadUserId] AS UploadUserId, b.[Name] AS UploadUserName, [UploadDateTime] AS UploadDateTime, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.[Id] DESC) AS RowIndex FROM [FileStorage] a LEFT JOIN [RBAC].[User] b ON a.UploadUserId=b.Id
) SELECT * FROM CTE WHERE RowIndex BETWEEN (#PageIndex#-1)*#PageSize#+1 AND #PageIndex#*#PageSize# ORDER BY RowIndex ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [FileStorage] a LEFT JOIN [RBAC].[User] b ON a.UploadUserId=b.Id
